definition: (of crops) harvested at an early stage of development, any immature animal
details:
adjective
- (of crops) harvested at an early stage of development
= synonyms: new
- not tried or tested by experience
= synonyms: untested, untried, unseasoned
- being in its early stage
= example: being in its early stage
- of living things, especially persons, in an early period of life or development or growth
= example: of living things, especially persons, in an early period of life or development or growth
= synonyms: immature
- suggestive of youth
= synonyms: youthful
noun
- any immature animal
= synonyms: offspring
- young people collectively
= example: young people collectively
= synonyms: youth
